typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double,
		InternationalAviation as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Aviation
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GroundTransport
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Industry
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Power
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Resindential
Aviation unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
GroundTransport unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot2
Industry unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot3
Power unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot4
Resindential unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot5
Unpivot1, Unpivot2, Unpivot3, Unpivot4, Unpivot5 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Pivot1 sort(asc({_c0}, true)) ~> Sort1
Union1 pivot(groupBy({_c0}),
	pivotBy(Country, ['China', 'India', 'US', 'EU27&UK', 'Russia', 'Japan', 'Brazil']),
	{} = round(sum(Value), 2),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Sort1 sink(input(
		DATE as timestamp,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DATE = {_c0},
		India,
		US,
		{EU27&UK},
		Russia,
		Japan,
		Brazil
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double,
		InternationalAviation as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Aviation
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GroundTransport
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Industry
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Power
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Residential
source(output(
		Date as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		World as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InternationalShipping
Aviation derive(Aviation = round(China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW+InternationalAviation, 2)) ~> Sum1
GroundTransport derive(GroundTransport = round(China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW, 2)) ~> Sum2
Industry derive(Industry = round(China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW,2)) ~> Sum3
Power derive(Power = round(China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW,2)) ~> Sum4
Residential derive(Residential = round(China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW,2)) ~> Sum5
Sum1 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Aviation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sum2 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		GroundTransport
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Sum3 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Industry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Sum4 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Power
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Sum5 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Residential
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select1, Select2 join(Select1@{_c0} == Select2@{_c0},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Select3 join(Select1@{_c0} == Select3@{_c0},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2, Select4 join(Select1@{_c0} == Select4@{_c0},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3, Select5 join(Select1@{_c0} == Select5@{_c0},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4, InternationalShipping join(Select1@{_c0} == Date,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join5
Join5 select(mapColumn(
		Date = Select1@{_c0},
		Aviation,
		GroundTransport,
		Industry,
		Power,
		Residential,
		InternationalShipping = World
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
Select6 sink(input(
		DATE as timestamp,
		Power as double,
		{Ground Transport} as double,
		Industry as double,
		Residential as double,
		Aviation as double,
		{International Shipping} as double,
		Globe as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
